site_name: Land Between Blackfriars Junction And London Bridge Station (Riverside Walkway
description: Discharge of Schedule 2, Clauses 3.7 to 3.9 'Completion of Section 38 Agreement and Section 25 Deed of Dedication for the New Riverside Walkway' of the Section 106 Agreement attached to planning permissions 04/AP/1137 and 04/AP/1135 [Approval date: 10.12.2009] for:"Widening of railway bridge on existing redundant bridge piers, removal of existing platforms/tracks, new track alignment and platform layout to provide 2 through tracks on east side of bridge and 2 terminating tracks on west side; platform extensions to accommodate 12 car trains spanning entire bridge; new platform roof canopy spanning bridge, incl roof supports and enclosure screens; new station entrance and ticket office on south side of river and diversion of river walk under Blackfriars Railway Bridge; modifications to southern abutment of former bridge incl. removal of existing central core infill, partial dismantling of walls and relocation of listed iron crests/cartouches to top of remodelled abutment part of Thameslink 2000]"
